argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | znval.s | |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | znval.u | |- U = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zringcrng | |- ZZring e. CRing |
| 4 | 1 | #P_znlidl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) = ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_quscrng | |- ( ( ZZring e. CRing /\ ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) ) -> U e. CRing ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_sylancr | |- ( N e. ZZ -> U e. CRing ) |
